bug.author: severin-lemaignan
bug.summary: [doc] Documentation report wrong number of hand keypoints
bug.description: Documentation on the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/39a0d767b05c23d55c9427ce623f7eb087505f3a/include/openpose/core/datum.hpp#L99>handKeypoints structure</denchmark-link> incorrectly reports 20 hand parts instead of 21, as correctly reported <denchmark-link:https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/master/doc/output.md>here</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: You are right, it is 21, sorry for the confusion. Fixed!
